nodes.text: The Assertor was the lead starship of the Galactic Empire's Assertor-class Star Dreadnought line. Both the Assertor and her sister ship, the Wrath, were laid down by Kuat Drive Yards before the Battle of Yavin.

As a Star Dreadnought, the Assertor was considerably larger than the common Star Destroyers of the Empire. On both ventral and dorsal sides, the ship was bristling with batteries of weapons. On the dorsal side, a central ridge extended to the aft, which supported the vessel's conning tower. Like Imperial Star Destroyers, the Assertor featured a similarly-designed conning tower with two deflector shield bulbs, as well as a large reactor bulge on the ventral side.

During the Imperial Era, the Assertor was part of a battle group in an area of space near a bluish-green celestial body and a smaller, grey astronomical object. The dreadnought was escorted by many TIE fighters and at least two Imperial II-class Star Destroyers.
